评论详情: These Korean retro oval women sunglasses from lumiluni are awesome.  These fit perfectly if you need sunglasses with a minimal nose bridge.  Normal sunglasses do not fit my wife's or daughter's face due to their nose bridge and these fit perfectly.  A very nice leather case is included.  A great value for the price and would recommend.

I'm so impressed by how high-quality this feels! If I hadn't seen the price, I would have guessed that these were far more expensive and they look it too! They're stylish and look really nice. The frames feel solidly made and not flimsy at all. I love the gold detailing that isn't too yellow, instead looking quite classy. The frames are different and the overall look is too, I love it!  I can tell what Korean brand they're imitating and, having bought a few pairs from Korea, I can say that I wouldn't have thought these would look out of place in the store honestly! The little black case and wipe it comes in is also a nice bonus.  Highly recommend!

These sunglasses are stylish! I was surprised by how good the quality is. They look great with any outfit and are also very comfortable to wear, even for a long time. Some of the best sunglasses I’ve bought, and I highly recommend for those looking for something both fashionable and practical!

I know it's dark, as it's winter, but as soon as I put them on I could see how beneficial these are going to be! I refuse to purchase any sunglasses without polarization, and I could see these were wonderfully polarized even before they were on fully! They feel durable and like they're quality material, they're flattering to my face, and the packaging and CASE they come in are awesome! Makes them look like a much pricier brand! Can't wait for a sunny day out to get the best use I can out of them!
I must say that I am very impressed with its quality and style. I can’t wait to gift it to my girlfriend.  The packaging was quite premium as well which is perfect for gifts.
Second time buying from this brand. It has an excellent quality, especially in this price range! It blocks sunlights well and looks good on all casual formal looks.

评论概述: Very cute sunglasses (the case is not leather)
评论详情: I got these glasses because they’re cute and they remind me of a style I liked from a luxury brand. The only reason this isn’t 5 stars is because of the “premium leather” case. It isn’t leather and I don’t know why it claims to be when these budget sunglasses are only $12.99. The case would cost more than the glasses if that were true. It also comes with a microfiber wipe for your sunglasses. Overall, it’s still a nice case for what it is but don’t expect anything premium or leather about it. If you want some cute sunglasses at an affordable price point I would recommend these.

评论概述: Stylish, Functional, and Perfectly Designed for Comfort!
评论详情: I recently purchased these sunglasses and couldn't be happier with my choice! They strike the perfect balance between style and comfort, making them a pleasure to wear for extended periods.  The UV protection is top-notch, providing excellent sun protection. One of the standout features is the nose pad design, which is particularly suitable for Asian faces. It ensures a snug and comfortable fit without slipping, even on hot days.  Additionally, the packaging was impressive—it came in a well-designed, luxurious pouch that adds a touch of elegance and makes it ideal for gifting as well.  Overall, these sunglasses exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a combination of functionality, comfort, and style!

I really love these sunglasses. It's very affordable but has high quality. The shape is kind of cool, and looks really stylish especially when worn like a hairband. If you want sunglasses for vacation this one will be the best choice! Truly recommended

评论概述: High quality sunglasses for a great price
评论详情: The sunglasses looks really nice. Perfect retro look and great for Asian faces with the high nose piece on the glasses. It also comes with a neat pouch and cloth.
